msg: Cycle 1 시작. 첫 운영 사이클 — 전 Division 작업 개시.

msg: Cycle 2. 9 tasks done, 9 issues logged. Arch 6/6 완료(PLAN-001~003, ADR-013~015). Research RES-001 완료. Quality QA-001+002 완료, 9 이슈 발견.

note: FIX-001: Quality 이슈 8건 plan 반영(ERR-001~002,004~009). FIX-002: ADR-001~012 개별 파일 생성(ERR-003). worktree: axel-wt-arch

msg: RES-002, RES-003 보고 없음. Research Division 다음 사이클에 상태 보고 요청.
Cycle 3. Research 대규모 진전: RES-002~005 전량 완료. Quality QA-003 완료, 10건 신규 이슈(5 HIGH). Arch FIX-001/002 보고 없음(2 cycles). Open errors: 19 (threshold 초과). ESCALATION 발동.
MISSION DRIFT: Redis 사용이 'PostgreSQL single DB' 원칙(MISSION #2)과 충돌. ADR-002/003 간 긴장 미해결. ADR-016으로 해소 필요. Human review 요청.
Arch Division FIX-001/FIX-002 2 cycles 무보고. worktree 확인 및 재시작 필요.
Open errors 19건 (threshold 5). Quality 발견 속도가 수정 속도 초과. Arch 병목 해소 시급.

note: QA-004: Research RES-002~005 결과물 quality gate 검증. worktree: axel-wt-quality

msg: Cycle 4. QA-004 완료: cross-reference integrity review, 4건 신규 이슈(2 HIGH, 2 MEDIUM). Arch FIX-001/002 3 cycles 무보고 — ESCALATION 심각도 상향. Open errors: 23. 전 Queued 작업이 Arch 소유 — critical path bottleneck.
CRITICAL: Arch Division 3 cycles (>1.5h) 무보고. Constitution §6 3+ cycles threshold 도달. worktree axel-wt-arch 수동 검사 및 에이전트 재시작 필요. 전체 파이프라인 blocked.
Open errors 23건 (threshold 5). 4.6x threshold 초과. Arch 재가동 없이는 감소 불가.
Division 배정: Research/Quality 대기 중 — Arch 해소 전까지 신규 배정 불가. FIX-005(P1) 생성: QA-004 독립 수정건(ToolDefinition type, migration direction). Arch 재가동 시 FIX-001/002 → FIX-005 → FIX-003 순서로 처리.

Cycle 5. QA-005 security design review 완료(자발적): 10건 신규 이슈(3 HIGH, 4 MEDIUM, 3 LOW). ERR-024~033 등록. FIX-006(P0 보안), ADR-019(인증 전략), FIX-007(P2 보안 LOW) 생성. Arch 4 cycles 무보고. Open errors: 33 (6.6x threshold). 전 9 Queued 태스크 Arch 소유.
CRITICAL (4 cycles, >2h): Arch Division 완전 정지. Constitution §6 위반. 전체 파이프라인 blocked — 33 errors, 9 queued tasks 전부 Arch 의존. 수동 재시작 필수. 권장 순서: FIX-005(독립) → FIX-001 → FIX-002 → FIX-003 → FIX-006.
보안 설계 갭: 인증 모델 미정(ERR-024), WS 무인증(ERR-025), 커맨드 인자 미검증(ERR-026). ADR-019 필요. Arch 재가동 후 FIX-006에서 해소.
Open errors 33건 (threshold 5, 6.6x 초과). Quality 발견 속도 >> Arch 수정 속도. Arch 없이 감소 불가.

Cycle 6. QA-006 implementability review 완료(자발적): 13건 신규 이슈(8 HIGH, 4 MEDIUM, 1 LOW). ERR-034~046 등록. FIX-008(P0 implementability), FIX-009(P1), ADR-020(Error Taxonomy), ADR-021(Resilience Patterns) 생성. Arch 5 cycles 무보고. Open errors: 46 (9.2x threshold). 전 13 Queued 태스크 Arch 소유. Quality 리뷰 각도 소진.
CRITICAL (5 cycles, >2.5h): Arch Division 완전 정지. 46 errors, 13 queued tasks 전부 Arch 의존. 수동 재시작 필수. 권장: FIX-005(독립) → FIX-001 → FIX-002 → FIX-008 → FIX-003 → FIX-006. 또는 mega-task로 통합하여 Arch 1세션에 처리.
IMPLEMENTABILITY GAPS: DI 컨테이너 불완전, 핵심 도메인 타입 미정의, ReAct 에러핸들링 없음, 에러 타입 체계 없음. CONSTITUTION quality gate 'distributed agent 구현 가능한 spec' 미충족.
Open errors 46건 (threshold 5, 9.2x 초과). Quality 5회 리뷰 완료 후 각도 소진. Arch 없이 감소 불가. Mega-task 통합 검토 권장.

Cycle 7. BACKLOG RESTRUCTURE 실행. QA-007 종합 리뷰 처리: 45이슈→4근본원인→7 Work Packages. FIX-001~009 + ADR-016/019~021 취소(13건), WP-1~7 + FIX-MED로 흡수. 의존성 체인 단순화 — WP-1/3/7은 무의존, 즉시 시작 가능. ERR-QG1/QG2 추가(CRITICAL). Arch 6 cycles 무보고. Open errors: 48 (9.6x threshold). Research/Quality idle.
CRITICAL (6 cycles, >3h): Arch Division 완전 정지. BACKLOG을 Work Package로 재구성하여 의존성 체인 제거. WP-1(ADR 배치 생성, 무의존)부터 시작 권장. 수동 재시작 필수.
QUALITY GATE BLOCKED: 5개 gate 중 Consistency/Feasibility NOT MET. Plan finalization 불가. 21 HIGH 이슈 해소 필요. ADR-001~012 파일 부재(QG2)가 최대 gap.

note: WP-1: ADR-001~012 배치 생성(무의존, 1cycle 예상). WP-3: Factual corrections 7건(무의존, 1cycle 예상). 병렬 처리 가능. Arch 재가동 즉시 착수. worktree: axel-wt-arch

msg: Cycle 8. No Division progress. Arch 7 cycles stalled — worktree clean, no comms. WP-1/WP-3 assigned Cycle 7, unstarted. Research/Quality idle, no independent work. Open errors: 48 (9.6x threshold, unchanged). ESCALATION MAINTAINED.
CRITICAL (7 cycles, >3.5h): Arch Division 완전 정지. 전체 파이프라인 blocked. WP-1/WP-3 무의존 태스크 2 cycles째 미착수. 수동 Arch 세션 시작 필수. launcher: .axel-ops/launchers/launch-arch.sh

CRITICAL (8 cycles, >4h): Arch Division unresponsive. Coordinator taking direct action — executing WP-1 and WP-3 in axel-wt-arch worktree.

Cycle 10. MAJOR BREAKTHROUGH. Arch completed WP-1~7 + ADR-017/018 (commit 15351d8). 8 tasks done, 23 errors resolved. Open errors: 48→24 (50% reduction). ADR-001~021 all exist. Pipeline fully unblocked. ESCALATION LIFTED for Arch stall.

note: P0: Redis role clarification — redefine as ephemeral cache with PG shadow writes. Update ADR-003. Resolves ERR-010, ERR-038. Only remaining P0 task. worktree: axel-wt-arch

msg: Cycle 12. FIX-MED completed (38472fa): 22 MEDIUM/LOW issues resolved in plan body. Open errors: 25→1 (ERR-QG1 CONDITIONAL pending QA-009). QA-009 assigned to Quality — FINAL task before plan finalization. No drift. No P0 blockers. All Divisions except Quality idle.

note: P1: Final quality gate sign-off. FIX-MED resolved 22 issues — verify against QA-009-PREP checklist. Confirm all 5 CONSTITUTION §3 quality gates PASS. If PASS → approve plan finalization. worktree: axel-wt-quality. LAST TASK.

msg: Cycle 13. PLAN FINALIZED. QA-009 completed (9ac0aeb): ALL 5 quality gates PASS. ERR-QG1 RESOLVED. Open errors: 0. Tasks: 30 done, 0 in progress, 0 queued. Planning phase COMPLETE. AWAITING HUMAN DECISION on implementation phase kickoff.

Cycle 14. STEADY STATE. No drift. No new Division comms. All state files current. 0 queued, 0 in progress, 30 done, 0 errors. Planning phase complete. AWAITING HUMAN DECISION on implementation phase kickoff.

note: HUMAN DIRECTIVE: Audit Division created. AUDIT-001 assigned. Key correction: embedding dimension 768d→3072d (Mark override of ADR-016 truncation choice). Arch: read comms/audit.jsonl for findings to fix.

(2) Cross-check all ADR decisions against plan body. (3) Verify model names, versions, numerical claims against official docs. No dependencies. Report findings to comms/audit.jsonl.
